 I find myself in the uncomfortable position of agreeing with you.
 
 N Korea and Iran with nukes probably do not constitute a credible threat. Traditionally balance of force has maintained peace, not destroyed it. N Korea and Iran neither one are going to use nukes unless attacked, and we will not attack as long as they have nuclear deterrents. 
 
 Nuclear weapons have never been particularly good military weapons. They are good deterrents, but that is about it because nobody dares use them.
